alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 29 at 9:17AM CST until December 29 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Yalobusha County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1230 PM CST. * At 917 AM CST, Between 4 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported flooding in the Bruce area. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bruce, Pittsboro, Shepherd, Skuna, Ellard, Bounds, Benwood, Tyson, Spearman and Gums. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
